subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Steroids
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Organizers of the Tour of California, who boasted after last year’s race that no riders tested positive for banned substances, have acknowledged that riders were not tested for the blood booster EPO.
snippet: Organizers of the Tour of California, who boasted after last year’s race that no riders tested positive for banned substances, have acknowledged that riders were not tested for the blood booster EPO.
